name: Cookie Clicker (itch) (The Silent House Studio)
description:
Cookie Clicker, a game about making an absurd amount of cookies, millions, trillions, BILLIONS! The game countains some fun features included in it, bakers, and shops! Sell your cookies properly and wisely to get an amount of money to spend on different options ;)

___FEATURES___

The Game Includes some "funny" and "relaxing" features!

Helpful addons in-game

SOUNDTRACK! Cookie Clicker countains a relaxing and anti-stress background music. SO ITS NOT JUST A CLICKING GAME! Well, it is but for people who want to relax at midnight playing a game like this, right?

BE CAREFUL! Its not that easy, your shop might get into a fire case, this will cost you YOUR COOKIES!


___MORE DETAILS___

-Cookie Clicker was made in 3 days, also the project got deleted and we had to re-script it.

-15 lines of codes

-Main Menu

-Saving System

_____HOW TO PLAY_____

_BAKERS_

A Baker can make cookies automatically for you (double's up cookies). Remember the more Bakers, the more cookies you get!

_SHOPS_

A Shop can sell cookies automatically for you and get more money! Remember the more Shops, the more money you get!

LETS MAKE SOME COOKIES
